DOC.brief_summary: Objective : test hypothesis recombinant activate protein C ( aPC ) therapy improve microcirculation severe septic patient . Design : Prospective , open study . Setting : University 12-beds intensive care unit . Patients : Septic patient least two sepsis-induced organ failure occur within 48 hour onset sepsis include one year period . Interventions : Patients contraindication aPC administration receive aPC dose 24 mcg/kg/h 96 hour . Patients contraindication aPC infusion consider control .
DOC.criteria: Septic patient least two sepsisinduced organ failure occur within 48 hour onset sepsis hematologic advance malignancy liver cirrhosis severely impaired consciousness ( Glasgow Coma Scale score < 7 15 ) therapeutic limitation ( donotresuscitate order )
